game.name: MEGA MAN Witter's Domination
game.desc: A city is under attack! Megaman rushes to investigate and soon enough he meets a ninja like dude who is being suspected for this attack. However they find out that a mysterious man named Witter wishes to conquer the world who is throwing chaos around the globe. Megaman and Slizer join forces, visit different parts of the world to put things in place but also go through some wacky light-hearted moments.
